statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating, survey_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '54c5d8c7-2407-4c22-861e-44b2e16a54fc'
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM customer_feedback
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_level FROM survey_results WHERE survey_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(survey_id) AS total_surveys FROM survey_results GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_surveys > 2;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_level) AS avg_satisfaction FROM survey_results GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_satisfaction >= 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 23;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM SurveyResults WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4;
SELECT program_id, customer_id, tier FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE tier = 'Silver';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN SurveyResults ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = SurveyResults.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id > 50 AND customer_id = 200;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT program_id, customer_id, tier FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE joining_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY customer_id, program_id;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, timestamp FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY customer_id, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE survey_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING total_feedback > 1;
SELECT * FROM survey_results JOIN customer_feedback ON survey_results.customer_id = customer_feedback.customer_id;
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_offers FROM loyalty_program LEFT JOIN loyalty_offers ON loyalty_program.program_id = loyalty_offers.program_id GROUP BY program_name;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE program_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResults ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, survey_id, survey_date FROM CustomerSurveyHistory WHERE customer_id = 301;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT survey_date, satisfaction_level, comments FROM SurveyResults WHERE satisfaction_level < 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE program_id = 2001;
SELECT program_id, feedback_text, rating FROM ProgramFeedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
